 data structure allowing for mapping from spooled category numbers to unspooled category numbers (see cm_spooled_to_unspooled)

Detailed Description

Allows "unspooling" of CategoryMap, i.e., a mapping from the original categories to a larger set that allows for categories to be "conditioned on" other categories.

For example, an intron category might be conditioned on a CDS category, meaning that a different version of the intron category should be instantiated for each possible category in the CDS range that the intron follows.
